answers.answer: diabetes can cause neuropathy (pins and needle pain in the foot).other medical problems can cause neuropathy: vit B deficiency, sciatica, medication side effect, increase alcohol consumption.i recommend getting  him evaluated by a physician.
why would  a person have numb feet? What is that a symtom of? What can a person do to help a numb, tingling foot? Does anyone know? I need answers its driving my hubby nuts.

question: My Husband has a problem w his feet, he says its like a pain but more a numb feeling w pins and needles when he walks, what could be wrong? Is this a symtom for something more serious?
title: numb feet
